versioning¶

Schema migration functions for SPAM database.

spam.model.versioning.db_downgrade(name, version)¶

Downgrade database name schema.

spam.model.versioning.db_get_version(name=None)¶

Get the migrate schema version for database name.

spam.model.versioning.db_init(name, version=None)¶

Init a database and put it under migrate control.

spam.model.versioning.db_upgrade(name, version=None)¶

Upgrade database name schema.

spam.model.versioning.migraterepo_get_version()¶

Get the migrate repository current version.
